name: Mecha-kun X Kaiju-chan
description:
MxK is a local Co-op fighting game for 2 players. Together with your friend, take  control of a giant mech and fight together against Kaiju . Will you defeat the Kaiju, or will you let the city be destroyed? At the end of the day, its either you and your friend will grow closer together, or both of you just want to kill each other.

//THIS IS A PROTOTYPE TO TEST THE COMBAT MECHANIC//

Features :

  • Local Co-op fighting game

  • Fight against epic Kaiju using giant Mecha

  • Resource Management

  • Unique Fighting Mechanic and experience.

Instruction :

  • You must use 2 controllers to play this game

  • Both player must press the same button for few seconds to fill the action gauge for the Mecha to perform an action
